extendedInfo.description: Lite version requires Internet connection. For offline support, try the Pro version.------------------------------------------------------------------Vehicle gas/service checker/reminderCloud data sync*****************************************************- Oil change reminder, car parts maintenance reminder- Gas fill-up check-in with location service.- Car usage statistics city/highway ratio, average MPG, maintenance history, gas refuel history, etc...- Search nearby auto shops*****************************************************Many people neglect the importance of maintaining oils, chemicals, and many parts that need to be replaced to prolong the car's life span. This app helps car owners, especially newbies to cars, manage their cars, track what services need to be done and so much more. The users can visualize their car parts' estimated life span so they can prepare up coming maintenance. * How the app works:Whenever you make a refuel, make a record of it. Check what this app can figure out from just doing this!Keywords: Car, Cars, Car Pro, CarPro, Car Management, Car Manager, Managements, Gas, Fuel, Repair, Maintenance, engine, transmission, auto, automobile, horsepower, hp, torque, tq, driver, driving, drivers, track, race

reviews.title: Useful information
reviews.comment: Excellent app to calculate mpg of your car. It has everything about car maintenace like when to change engine oil...transmission oil.. Etc! It is useful and easy to use! Not bad for a app that just cane out!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t have a Kia Soul as an option.
reviews.comment: Just bought a 2013 Kia Soul & it wasn\'t in the list of cars. I entered in all the car\'s info but it didn\'t save it...so pretty useless to me. Please delete my account, no option for that either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good job.
reviews.comment: The app is so much better after the update. Keep it up!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I take care of my car myself and this is a great app to keep track of what i did at when. Besides from the gas logs, I can tell so easily how much I spent on gas on any specific month or year. I will rate this app 5 stars
reviews.author: Nguyen Tran

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: This is the first app of this field. Keep going man\357\274\201
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good visual scroll for maintenance hope to see some improvement
reviews.comment: Good visual scroll for maintenance hope to see some improvement on its flexibility
reviews.author: Ernie Cervantes
